properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique id of the object

properties.name: overlap
properties.description: Overlap mean the z-index will be 1 instead of 0 so you can overlap elements

properties.name: windowed
properties.description: Windowed means the block will be surrounded by a white border of 2 * gridSize

properties.name: marginTop
properties.description: the amount of margin to be applied to the top (marginTop * gridSize)

properties.name: disableTransitionIn
properties.description: If you want to disable the default transition in for the component, for example when you start nesting block components inside of other block components and you want to have control over the transition in

properties.name: blocks
properties.description: The blocks inside this block

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The tags linked to this article

properties.name: image
properties.description: The image that will be displayed in the article teaser

properties.name: target
properties.description: The target that the teaser should link to

properties.description: The main paragraph displayed

properties.description: The alt text of the image

properties.description: The target of the link

properties.description: The deeplink data of the link

properties.description: the base paths of the images in the sequences without the extension

properties.description: The total amount of frames in the image sequence

properties.name: autoplay
properties.description: do we want to autoplay the sequence or want to trigger it manually
